sources.title: The Fox and the Duck (1945)
sources.description: A duck goes into the business of selling eggs, and has many prize egg-laying hens working for him. A fox tries to break up the business and burglarizes it. The duck goes to a dog, a pig and a fish looking for help against the fox, but they all choose not to get involved. So the duck takes matters into his own hands...or wings. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-fox-and-the-duck-1945/

metadata.Plot: A duck goes into the business of selling eggs, and has many prize egg-laying hens working for him. A fox tries to break up the business and burglarizes it. The duck goes to a dog, a pig and a fish looking for help against the fox, but they all choose not to get involved. So the duck takes matters into his own hands...or wings.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
